Decker#3767
Content:
Found interesting thing. Yesterday, when somebody broadcast 200+ bet txes they exists in mempool, but appears in blocktemplate with a big delay:
```komodo-cli -ac_name=KMDICE getrawmempool | jq length
192
komodo-cli -ac_name=KMDICE getblocktemplate | jq '.transactions | length'
8```
192 txes in mempool, but in blocktemplate only 8 ...
But now, when i'm sent ~1500 normal txes it appears in mempool and blocktemplate immediatily, as a result all 1500 txes included in last 2 blocks:

Author: siu - Chainmakers#3920
Content: Also although the house doesnt have an edge... nothing stops a gui dev to get an edge from a good gui that people are willimg to use even if they need to pay a small fee per play

Author: siu - Chainmakers#3920
Content: We did make this chain with the intent for it to be public from start. As in serious... well, its a dice game and we dont have a financial gain from it, its mostly a community chain. So i dont think we will go serious with this as in creating business models and such. That will be in the hands of the community
